lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: Investing in determined entrepreneurs is one of the most direct ways to elevate poor people out of poverty. Engaging in small-scale efforts to eradicate poverty and hunger is a little, but significant, step towards reaching the Millennium Development Goals by 2015.
lenders.occupational_info:
For my PhD I'm researching human security, food security and the impacts of foreign agricultural investment in Africa. For my fieldwork research I just spent 6 months in Kenya.

With Pacific Friends of the Global Fund to Fight AIDS, TB and Malaria I raise awareness of HIV/AIDS, tuberculosis and malaria in the Pacific region and advocate for increased investment in the innovative financing mechanism of the Global Fund.

lenders.occupational_info: I used to look at rocks and wanted to find metal ore and oil.

lenders.name: bud
lenders.loan_because: I have many friends in the Colon and La Miskito areas of  Honduras that are hard working and industrious, but lack the venture capitol to get started. I thought if I got started helping others in Honduras I could learn a bit more about micro finance and possibly help those I know.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a sheet metal worker. We design, fabricate and install air conditioning systems in commercial buildings. We also do architectural metal work such as roofs and siding. 
  In my spare time i also guide medical teams into the La Miskito area of Honduras to provide health services to the indigenous population that reside there. Visit our website at   www.projectchimes.org

lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do
lenders.occupational_info: Director of a Child Abuse Prevention Agency serving kids and families

lenders.name: Niels
lenders.loan_because: I crossed many countries on my bicycle and know what a big difference a small loan can make. Also, people along the road have been so great to me, this is my way of doing something back.
lenders.occupational_info: A few years ago I set up www.greenseat.com where people can calculate and offset carbon emissions of their flight. Currently, I am working on a renewable energy cooperation: www.ener.coop

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I can, really. Why not give money when you're able?
lenders.occupational_info: I'm just a student at Fordham University right now. It's my Freshman year right now, and I'm not sure what I want to major in.

lenders.name: Katy
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: Even though I'm a single parent, I live in a place that allows me to earn enough to keep a roof over my head, food on the table, and live a healthy, happy life.  I can only hope the little I can give will help someone else create and/or sustain a healthy, happy life as well!
lenders.occupational_info:
I love showing off my Canadian pride and the mountains & ocean of the Pacific Northwest.  We have the best 'backyard' to play in, especially on two wheels!

Waterfitness is also a huge passion, and it's wonderful to see my participants progress to meet and increase their goals through the huge and wide array of benefits in aquatics.

People in the world have all sorts of opinions, so in sharing those voices we can understand better the diversity in the world and - hopefully - better adapt and cooperate with each other :)

lenders.name: Maureen
lenders.loan_because: ...the impact of  my small donation has the power to be life changing

lenders.occupational_info: I am studying ethics and education in a Canadian university.

Designing man-made elements to fit onto the land and creating new places for people to live, work and play.

lenders.occupational_info: I work as an artist and it is my dream to contribute through my art a vision  for a more peaceful and loving humanity.

lenders.name: Joanna
lenders.loan_because: I think its important to help those who want to help themselves.  Sharing the experience is rewarding and is important in a world when so many people have become so self centred.
lenders.occupational_info: I have 2 children and help my husband run our family owned construction company.  We started with nothing and have built it up so we can employ a team of local people in our local community.  We think it helps build strong families and strong communities.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I was given a loan to get started. I lived in Africa as a young girl and love the idea of being of help to someone there, the way africa filled me with good memories of kind people.
lenders.occupational_info: I grow herbs and bag them in a machine and then put them in a colourful box (in french and english) and then sell them to health stores.

lenders.name: Marla
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of helping people help themselves.  It's very inspiring to see people all over the world helping people all over the world!
lenders.occupational_info: My organization helps people become homeowners who could not normally afford it.  Habitat for Humanity builds houses for low income families and sells the houses to the families at a low cost with no interest.  Families work on the houses 300 hours.

lenders.name: Karoline
lenders.loan_because: I want to give others a chance to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I help researchers do the admistrative work in getting funding for their projects.  I do the government paperwork in order to apply for the grants.  After the grants are obtained, I manage the finances for the grants

lenders.name: Renee
lenders.loan_because: I can turn on a tap and get clean water, I have access to healthcare, food, and a safe place to sleep. I can afford to travel to places where this isn't always possible. I want to make a difference - not just take a photo.

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: With such small amounts people can do so much, I've been helped now I can do a bit in return

lenders.name: Kimberley
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a fantastic idea to help people to help themselves!
lenders.occupational_info: I create print based design work that includes logos, stationery, brochures, posters, flyers, packaging and advertising

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a university professor in a business school.

lenders.name: Ruth
lenders.loan_because: it is such a great way to give a hand up to people, and it is ongoing.  By repaying the loans, they are also helping to give others a hand up when the money is re-loaned.  It is people helping people at the grass roots.
lenders.occupational_info: I was asked to make a knitted nativity scene for someone, who insisted on paying me for it.  I added some of my own money, and was able to make 4 loans initially.  I mean to make more loans as I am able.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: i would to like to add my capital to my small store in our place.
lenders.occupational_info: i am helping our parish through Parish Social Action Livelihood to support our group of men and women for thier livelihood activities

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I would want to not be afraid to ask for help if I needed it. I need to be a part of a world that helps one another to believe this.
lenders.occupational_info: I help the business (sales, quality control) talk to Information Technology (Tech, IT). I solve business efficiency problems.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I'm inspired by business people of all kinds, and I believe it will make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: When a company needs a new executive, they ask me and my firm to find the right person.

lenders.name: Jessika
lenders.loan_because: I would not be where I am if it were not for the faith that others have had in me.

lenders.name: jeeni
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: love makes the world go round!

lenders.name: Haley
lenders.loan_because: I am always worried about I never have any money. But, when I look at how unfortunate so many people are in the world, I realize how rich I am.

lenders.name: Luke
lenders.loan_because: we should all help each other. Everyone deserves the right to work for themselves and start their own business to earn the income they deserve so they can support themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a small business designing websites and brochures for other businesses. I have a passion for travel, new adventures and meeting new people.

lenders.name: Les & Kaye
lenders.loan_because: We would like to make a contribution to the life of others.
